Description: This registry defines the EventLog messages for Redfish

Alert.Description: Indicates that a condition exists which requires attention
Alert.Message: %1 - %2 action was triggered which requires attention

ResourceAdded.Description: Indicates that a resource was added successfully.
ResourceAdded.Message: The resource at %1 was successfully added.

ResourceRemoved.Description: Indicates that a resource was successfully removed.
ResourceRemoved.Message: The resource at %1 was successfully removed.

ResourceUpdated.Description: Indicates that a resource was successfully updated.
ResourceUpdated.Message: The value of attribute %1 at %2 was successfully updated from %3 to %4.

StatusChange.Description: Indicates that the status of a resource has changed.
StatusChange.Message: The status %1 of resource at %2 has changed from %3 to %4

TriggerAlert.Description: The trigger condition '%1' under the resource '%2' was triggered for the MetricProperty '%3' with a Value '%4' which requires attention.
TriggerAlert.Message: The trigger condition '%1' under the resource '%2' was triggered for the MetricProperty '%3' with a Value '%4' which requires attention.

Name: EventLog Message Registry
